pages.text:
Unhitched RV
Where Home Meets the Outdoors
About UnhitchedRV
At Unhitched RV, we're a team of outdoor enthusiasts and professionals united by our passion for life and the beauty of the RV and campground experience. We're driven by a desire to create unforgettable experiences that bring people closer to nature and to each other.
Our Story
Our journey began with a love for the RV lifestyle and a vision to create exceptional outdoor hospitality experiences. Today, we own, operate, or manage 17 RV resorts and campgrounds across the US, with a growing portfolio of properties that offer the best locations, facilities, and services in the industry.
Uniquely Skilled, Uniquely Passionate
Our team brings together a deep passion for the outdoors and a wealth of diverse industry experience. This combination of enthusiasm and expertise enables us to innovate, adapt, and thrive in a rapidly changing industry. We're committed to continuously learning, adapting, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in outdoor hospitality.
Our Family of Brands
Unhitched RV is part of a larger family of brands dedicated to elevating the outdoor hospitality industry. Our parent company, Climb Capital, is a leading investor in RV resorts and parks across the US. Our sister company, Unhitched Management, provides expert management, marketing, and development services to help RV resorts and parks thrive. And our Unhitched RV U(niversity) offers education, training, and industry insights to help RV park owners and operators succeed.
Leadership
Our team is led by Robert Preston, Co-founder and CEO of Climb Capital. A seasoned entrepreneur and outdoor enthusiast, Robert brings a wealth of experience in commercial real estate investment and outdoor hospitality. Under his leadership, we're committed to creating unforgettable experiences that bring people closer to nature and to each other.
Join Our Community
At Unhitched RV, we're more than just a company – we're a community of outdoor enthusiasts dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences. Join us today, and discover a world of adventure, exploration, and connection.

Unhitched RV
Contact
UnhitchedRV
Have a question, comment, or need assistance? Our team is here to help. Whether you're looking for information about our services or have something to share, we’re committed to providing the support you need. What’s on your mind?
